description:
Some people have a fantasy of being a real estate broker. They believe being a broker can easily earn a fortune . Are they true? Is it the whole story of being a broker. In this lecture, top agents Judith Brooks and Frank Liu will share their real stories of being a real estate broker. Thus, you will get a big picture of this career before you decide to be a real estate agent. Indeed, this field may be easy to enter, but at the same time it can be easy kicked out. People have to physically and mentally prepare. In addition, Judith and Frank will tell you what are the qualifications to be a successful broker.

The learning objective is to help you decide rather being a real estate is something that you really want. In future, there will be more talks from Judith and Frank, and they will share more useful knowledge with you. Thus you can successfully establish your business step by step and survive in the real estate market.
title: Real Estate Real Talk
